label: applicableMaterial
comment: Material applicable for this supply chain trade line item.
Material applicable to this product print.
Specified material applicable to this product colour.

rangeIncludes.comment: A substance from which something is or could be made.

domainIncludes.comment: Any text or pattern put on the surface of a product using a specific material such as dye.
A collection of information specific to an item being used or reported on for supply chain trade purposes.
